videos.description: P.J. Tucker grabs an offensive rebound and scores despite being fouled.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (P.J. Tucker battles down low for and-1 basket) 2022/02/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: P.J. Tucker battles down low for and-1 basket

videos.description: Duncan Robinson gets the ball in transition and throws down a rare dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dunkin' Robinson slams it home) 2022/02/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dunkin' Robinson slams it home

videos.description: Kyrie Irving blows by Jimmy Butler and then hits a jump shot over Bam Adebayo to score.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kyrie hits tough step-back jumper over Bam) 2022/02/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kyrie hits tough step-back jumper over Bam

videos.description: Day'Ron Sharpe overpowers Tyler Herro in the paint to flush a two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Day'Ron Sharpe throws it down with authority) 2022/02/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Day'Ron Sharpe throws it down with authority

videos.description: P.J. Tucker lays out to swat a loose ball directly into Duncan Robinson's hands for a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (P.J. Tucker's incredible diving dime sets up a Heat triple) 2022/02/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: P.J. Tucker's incredible diving dime sets up a Heat triple

videos.description: Kyrie Irving shows off his handle as he drives for the and-1 bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kyrie drives for the hoop and the harm) 2022/02/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kyrie drives for the hoop and the harm

videos.description: Jimmy Butler comes up clutch for the Heat in the final minute vs. the Nets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler banks in contested shot in crunch time) 2022/02/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler banks in contested shot in crunch time

videos.description: Kyrie Irving puts on a spectacular ball-handling display to score a tough basket against the Heat.

videos.headline: 'Kyrie vs. everybody!' Irving dribbles through entire Heat defense to score
